ch0018_10_chris/0101_0701_02_10:
Suicune and I wouldn’t want to start our adventure
today without you!
ch0018_10_chris/7101_0701_01_10:
Team Rocket made a lot of trouble in the
Johto region...
ch0018_10_chris/7101_0701_02_10:
I can’t help but get angry every time I hear
their name!
ch0018_10_chris/7101_0701_03_10:
Using Pokémon for evil deeds is absolutely
never OK!
ch0018_10_chris/7102_0701_01_10:
It’s taking me a little while to get used to how
fluttery this new outfit is. It’s nothing like what
I normally wear.
ch0018_10_chris/7102_0701_02_10:
But the more I look at it, the more I see how
well it captures Suicune’s essence!
ch0018_10_chris/7102_0701_03_10:
Wearing it almost feels like wearing a security
blanket—like Suicune’s right here with me.
ch0018_10_chris/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m thinking about making sygna suits my next
research topic.
ch0018_10_chris/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s so interesting how wearing one can deepen
your bond and make you feel like you’re really
one with your Pokémon...
ch0018_10_chris/7103_0701_03_10:
That’s probably what leads to your sync stone
being more effective, too, huh.
ch0018_10_chris/7104_0701_01_10:
Suicune has the power to purify water instantly,
no matter how mucky it is.
ch0018_10_chris/7104_0701_02_10:
Having it around must be such a blessing for
Pokémon and the natural environments they
live in.
ch0018_10_chris/7104_0701_03_10:
We can ask Suicune to use its powers to help us
humans, too, but we don’t want to have to rely
on it too much.
ch0018_10_chris/7105_0701_01_10:
I may not be able to read your mind or see the
emotions within you...
ch0018_10_chris/7105_0701_02_10:
but I know you’ve got a heart like a crystal clear
spring, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0018_10_chris/7105_0701_03_10:
All the Trainers and Pokémon around you can’t
help but want to open their hearts right back
to you.
ch0018_10_chris/1701_0701_01_10: I got a present for you! Use it well!
ch0018_10_chris/1701_0702_01_10:
That should come in handy for you! I highly
recommend it!
ch0018_10_chris/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve grown so much since coming to Pasio...
ch0018_10_chris/2501_0701_02_10:
I wish I could show the Suicune I encountered back
in Johto what I’m capable of now.
ch0018_10_chris/2501_0701_03_10:
And the person who chased Suicune around with
me... I’d like to show them, too.
ch0018_10_chris/2501_0702_01_10:
I don’t think I’d be who I am today if not
for them...
ch0018_10_chris/2501_0702_02_10:
We should be thankful to all the people and
Pokémon we get to meet! *giggle*
ch0018_10_chris/2511_0701_01_10:
The first time I ever saw a Suicune was in the
Johto region.
ch0018_10_chris/2511_0701_02_10:
Back then, I thought it would be so wonderful
to be able to go on adventures with one...
And now I have one by my side.
ch0018_10_chris/2511_0701_03_10: I guess dreams really do come true!
ch0018_10_chris/2511_0702_01_10:
I hope you and I can have a dream that we
chase after together.
ch0018_10_chris/2511_0702_02_10:
Good things tend to happen to people who follow
their hopes and dreams.
ch0018_10_chris/3001_0701_01_10:
In the morning, I get so excited about the day
ahead that I don’t feel groggy at all!
ch0018_10_chris/3003_0701_01_10:
I think I saw a sync pair with a rare Pokémon
earlier. Have you seen them around here?
ch0018_10_chris/3005_0701_01_10:
What a day! I hope wonderful encounters await
you, even in your dreams!
